3. The hearts (♥) and clubs (♣) are less relevant, with H11 being the only face card but not significantly impactful.
4. The spades (♠) are the least relevant in this context.

Considering all of this, my final list will focus on maximizing the presence of the highest scoring cards, particularly the diamonds.
